message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $9,500. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you, and this price reflects its true value.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $8,500. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $8,500 is below my bottom line. I could meet you halfway at $9,000. This is a fair price considering the value it brings.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering the value and the market rate, I would like to offer $8,750 for the product. I hope we can reach an agreement that is satisfactory for both of us.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  How about we split the difference and settle at $8,875? This allows us both to benefit from the deal.
